caption.title: Serology of MAYV and CHIKV in French Guiana.
caption.p: a MAYV and CHIKV relative fluorescence intensity (RFI) for the 2697 individuals included in the study. b Map of French Guiana showing the location of samplings in 22 municipalities. Colors in the map indicate the seven geographical clusters. Mean +/− SEM of the RFI stratified in 10-year age groups is shown for each region for MAYV (purple) and CHIKV (orange). Sample sizes for each age class are given in Supplementary Table 4.
